gallaecia.title: RPG Celta: Gallaecia
gallaecia.subtitle: Aventura RPG ambientada en los pueblos celtas del noroeste hispano
gallaecia.description: Aventura RPG ambientada en los pueblos celtas del noroeste hispano
gallaecia.longDescription: Un RPG épico que sigue las tradiciones celtas de Gallaecia antes y durante la llegada de Roma. Los jugadores encarnan a un druida que debe preservar las tradiciones ancestrales mientras navega las complejas relaciones con las tribus locales y los invasores romanos.
features: Sistema de magia druídica basado en elementos naturales
Relaciones complejas entre tribus celtas y romanos
Mundo abierto inspirado en la Galicia antigua
Rituales sagrados en castros y bosques druídicos
Sistema de estaciones que afecta la magia y gameplay
Narrativa ramificada basada en decisiones morales

images.alt: Castro celta en las montañas gallegas
Ritual druídico en el bosque sagrado

tarraconensis.title: Inside the Crow's Nest
tarraconensis.subtitle: Survival Horror videogame
tarraconensis.longDescription: Inside the Crow 's Nest is a Survival Horror game inspired by old-school genre classics. You play as the Hunter, who awakens in a cell marked with strange symbols, trapped in a cult-infested monastery. To escape, you must survive horrifying cultists, uncover dark secrets, and solve intricate puzzles that block your escape.
features: A Mystery Waiting to Be Uncovered

cartaginensis.title: LUQUI Engine
cartaginensis.subtitle: 3D Graphics Engine
cartaginensis.longDescription: LUQUI Engine is a modern 3D graphics engine developed in C++ using OpenGL for rendering. Designed as a flexible and efficient framework for video game development, it implements an architecture based on the Entity-Component-System (ECS) pattern that allows for the creation of high-performance interactive applications.

lusitania.title: Poopy Walk
lusitania.subtitle: 2D Platformer game
lusitania.longDescription: Game Jam game made in 2024 for the Global Game Jam. A 2D platformer based on JetPack Joyride where the protagonist is pooping himself and needs to arrive to the toilet before running out of time.

images.alt: The player just been hit by a flying poop.

baetica.title: Nexus
baetica.subtitle: Mobile App
baetica.longDescription: Nexus is a companion app for gamers developed in Kotlin with Jetpack Compose. The app allows players to manage gaming sessions, connect with other players, and access information about their scheduled games. It is essentially a social organizer for gaming that facilitates coordination between players.

baleares.title: Water Time
baleares.subtitle: A Unity VR project
baleares.longDescription: Water Time is a virtual reality experience developed as an academic project where we first learned to use VR development techniques in Unity. The game aims to evoke nostalgic memories of childhood beach days, recreating that carefree feeling of playing with water while adding elements of gameplay, fun, and challenge. Through intuitive VR interactions, players can manipulate water in various ways, solving puzzles and enjoying the sensory experience that brings back the simple joy of splashing around on a hot summer day. We focused on implementing realistic water behavior using Unity's particle systems, ensuring that the water interactions felt natural and responsive in VR. Special attention was paid to optimization for VR performance while maintaining visual fidelity.
features: Intuitive hand-tracking interactions for manipulating water
Immersive environment designed specifically for virtual reality
Optimized performance for smooth VR gameplay
